fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Touch a player at night, learning their exact role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
None
Vampire Fixation: Your ability changes to attack two players at night, killing them. If you are alive after two nights of a Vampire Fixation having been active, Bella dies.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
